data.title: Rediscover the meaning of technology.
data.meta_description: We offers customized, innovative and attractive solutions for all types of digital needs. Cloud, Big Data, Artificial Intelligence, AR/VR, IoT, Blockchain ...
data.text:
Cybersecurity

Elevate Your Business Protection with Zero Trust

Adopt Zero Trust with Plain Concepts and secure your business systems. An integral approach to validate every transaction and counteract threats in real time. In addition, we offer specialized cybersecurity training to strengthen teams

Services

Azure OpenAI Consulting Services

The Azure OpenAI Framework by Plain Concepts is designed to ensure the proper application of OpenAI in enterprise environments, improving process efficiency, production needs, and critical business security.Additionally, we offer the Generative AI Adoption Accelerator, a service that gathers best practices, explores key trends, and identifies use cases to maximize their utilization in your organization.

News

Tech Trends 2024

We compile the Top 10 technology trends and innovations that will shape business and the economy in 2024.

News

Plain Concepts Partner of the Year in Responsible AI and Finalist in AI and Data Analytics

We are very happy to share that Plain Concepts has been awarded Partner of the Year in Responsible AI and a finalist in AI, Data & Analytics, and Partner of the Year Spain categories.

Offer

MLOps Maturity Model!

Our MLOps maturity model is designed to help organizations understand and implement best practices for creating and operating a production-level machine learning environment.

By assessing your current level of maturity, you can identify areas for improvement and develop a roadmap for achieving a more advanced and efficient MLOps ecosystem.

Solutions

Solutions

Cloud Solutions

At Plain Concepts we specialize in incorporating companies from all types of sectors with the cloud computing services that best suit their characteristics, generating scenarios, architectures, solutions and applications tailored to the needs of each business.

Solutions

Artificial Intelligence

From Plain Concepts, Microsoftâ€™s AI Partner, we help you automate your operations, add value to your products / services and discover new lines of business, while your systems do not stop learning and improving their functionality automatically.

Solutions

Data

We help our clients to transform all types of data into relevant information for their business, helping them to evolve their business by incorporating the culture of data through the use of agile, scalable and non-disruptive Business Intelligence tools.

Solutions

Web Applications

We create web applications designed to add value to your business and provide a great user experience, enhancing engagement and adoption.

Solutions

Augmented and Virtual Reality

Pioneers in the generation of Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality solutions in the business sector, we have extensive experience merging the advantages of the physical world with the digital world thanks to our own graphic engine capable of creating 3D and 2D solutions for any platform.

Solutions

Internet of Things

Thanks to our extensive experience in all types of technologies, our IoT developments are able to boost companies and transform their needs into differential values.

Discover new sources of revenue, improve operational efficiency and enhance customer loyalty with our IoT solutions.

Solutions

Technical Marketing

Our Technical Marketing team has been built along six years of partnership with Microsoft Corporation product development teams.

During this time, we have been working with them to amplify the showcasing of the latest Microsoft products in worldwide events like Connect, Ignite, Ready, and Build.

Solutions

Blockchain

We help our clients to explore and discover the Blockchain technology.

Through customized, reliable and high-value solutions, we reflect its great potential to revolutionize the way industries handle digital trust, transactions and value exchanges.

Solutions

Business Applications

From complete mobile applications to custom integrations, we cover a wide range of services thanks to our expertise after more than a decade developing business apps and reinventing them according to the changing needs of our customers as well as the emergence of new technologies.

Solutions

Modern Workplace

We drive the digital transformation of companies with the implementation of the Microsoft 365 suite, designed to increase connectivity, collaboration, and productivity of any company.

And we increase its value by customizing its tools, aligning them with the culture and specific needs of your company.

Solutions

UX & UI design

Our UX / UI design service specializes in creating product experiences that achieve our customersâ€™ goals and build user loyalty.

We study and design each user interaction with a product and create a complete experience that empowers product and customer.

Innovation and Research

Generating 3D assets using AI

We review the first AI models that make 3D asset generation possible and compare commercial and open source models.

Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics

A guide for businesses to scale generative AI

We compile the steps and common pitfalls in navigating the challenges that new developments will pose to businesses and the keys to implementing a scalable AI framework.

Culture and Commitment

Sustainable Digitalization to combat climate change

We explore what sustainable digitalisation is, the keys to achieving it and why you should introduce it into your processes.

Enterprise Aplications

GitHub Copilot: Pilot test and initial results

We have decided to carry out a pilot test on a small group of employees, but it is beginning to present some interesting initial conclusions, which we will corroborate in the following phases of the analysis.

Innovation and Research

Smart beaches: A commitment to Sustainable Tourism

We focus on how technology is reshaping such a summer space as beaches to make them more sustainable and offer a better experience.

Innovation and Research

Maximizing AI Performance with Intel Arc A770 GPU on Windows

Through practical steps and detailed insights, we explore how to set up and optimize the Arc A770 GPU for various AI models, including Llama2, Llama3, and Phi3. The article also includes performance metrics and memory usage statistics, providing a comprehensive overview of the GPUâ€™s capabilities.
